analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/9/0x6aa27b3a8aab51745b7eaf53e61aba833b0f9400.sol:
	Contract PCC has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/9/0x6aa27b3a8aab51745b7eaf53e61aba833b0f9400.sol#206-207)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/9/0x6aa27b3a8aab51745b7eaf53e61aba833b0f9400.sol#75-76) is not in mixedCase
